source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00030_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Lord Commander. We have received an urgent message from the Holy See.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00030_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>イシュガルドの特使殿。
たった今、イシュガルドの教皇庁より連絡がありました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I am grieved to report that your serpentine foes have resumed their assault. Needless to say, your presence is urgently required. These knights have come to bear you swiftly home to Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>何でも、ドラゴン族が再び皇都を襲撃したため、帰国せよと……。
急を要すとのことで、騎士の方々が迎えに参ったようです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00050_AYMERIC<tab>...A surprise attack?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00050_AYMERIC<tab>……皇都が？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00060_LUCIA<tab>We've had no such word from our men. And the timing is most fortuitous to catch us away from the city...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00060_LUCIA<tab>こちらに情報は回ってきていません。
それに、あまりに折が良すぎます。
……もしや。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00070_AYMERIC<tab>Most fortuitous indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00070_AYMERIC<tab>なるほど……な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00080_TEMPLEKNIGHT02400<tab>Lord Commander, we must away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00080_TEMPLEKNIGHT02400<tab>総長、お早く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00090_AYMERIC<tab>You have been a most gracious host. I hope that I might one day return the favor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00090_AYMERIC<tab>報せてくれたことに感謝します、ウルダハの友人よ。
この「借り」は、いつか返させていただきましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00100_AYMERIC<tab>Come, Lucia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00100_AYMERIC<tab>行くぞ、ルキア。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00010_THANCRED<tab>Whatever is going on in there...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00010_THANCRED<tab>……何の騒ぎだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00020_THANCRED<tab>Ah, the ever-dutiful Brass Blades. I must apologize, but my dance card is rather full. Another time, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00020_THANCRED<tab>デートの申し出かい？
あいにく、そういう趣味はないんだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00030_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>Thancred of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn. You stand accused of committing acts of espionage in service to the Garlean Empire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00030_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>「暁」のサンクレッドだな。
……貴様には、先のガレマール帝国との戦いで、
帝国軍に内通していた容疑がかけられている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00040_THANCRED<tab>Espionage? What in the seven hells are you talking about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00040_THANCRED<tab>内通だと……何のことだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00050_THANCRED<tab>Ah. If you're referring to that business with the Ultima Weapon, then you must understand─I-I wasn't myself...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00050_THANCRED<tab>……まさか、アシエンに支配されていた時の？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00060_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>Under interrogation, an imperial prisoner revealed your involvement in numerous dealings with the enemy. We've also been investigating reports that you are a practitioner of forbidden arts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00060_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>こちらで捕らえた帝国兵の尋問から、
貴様が関わっていたとの証言を得ている。
それに、何やら怪しげな術を使うとの報告もな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00070_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>You'd best come along with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00070_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>さて、いっしょに来てもらおうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00080_THANCRED<tab>You invite me to your party and now you want me to leave? I do so detest receiving mixed signals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00080_THANCRED<tab>無理やりパーティーに呼んでおいて、
今度はさっさと出ていけって？
ずいぶん勝手な事を言うじゃないか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00090_THANCRED<tab>Come, then. I believe I've lost my appetite for this farce of a celebration!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00090_THANCRED<tab>……さては、この祝賀会自体、仕組まれたものか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00010_RAUBAHN<tab>You go too far, Lord Adeledji! By what right do you march armed soldiers into a royal banquet and eject state visitors without Her Grace's consent!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00010_RAUBAHN<tab>テレジ・アデレジ、これはどういうつもりだ！
宴席に武装兵を送り込み、国賓を女王の許可無く退出させるとは、
貴様、何を考えている！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00020_RAUBAHN<tab>You treat the Brass Blades as your personal army, and show contempt for the throne with your every act. Leave us. Now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00020_RAUBAHN<tab>銅刃団の私兵化、王家主催の祝賀会での愚行……
度を越えた越権行為だ！
……さっさと撤収させろ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00030_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Is that an order, General? Mayhap you have mistaken me for one of your Flames? You will find I am not so slavishly obedient. And you lecture <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> on personal armies!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00030_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>何を言うか、ラウバーン！
……不滅隊こそ、貴様の私兵ではないか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>As for your <var 1A 02 /var>outrageous<var 1A 01 /var> claim that I have shown contempt for the throne, let all here observe that it was not <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who feasted while an assassin removed its occupant!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>ナナモ陛下が暗殺され、国の存続が危ぶまれる事態ぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00050_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I expect this is your idea of defending the nation, is it? This and diluting our forces through these distractions in Carteneau and Coerthas!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00050_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>かような状況から国を守るべきはずの不滅隊の兵力を、
容易にカルテノーやクルザスに回した貴様の責任は、
どう取るつもりだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I do begin to see how the ranks of the Immortal Flames came to be riddled with Garlean sympathizers! You are plainly unfit for command!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>ましてや、腹心に帝国の間諜を飼っていたとは……
局長とは名ばかりの、愚将ではないか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00070_RAUBAHN<tab>Wait... Wait, gods damn you! Your words make no sense. What assassin?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00070_RAUBAHN<tab>今……何と言った……？
……ナナモ様が……暗殺されただと……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00080_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>You mean to say you don't know!? We caught the vaunted champion of the Scions in Her Grace's private chambers not moments after the deed was done!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00080_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>さよう……！
そこにいる「暁の血盟」に与する冒険者が、その首謀者だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00090_MINFILIA<tab>No─ No, this cannot be!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00090_MINFILIA<tab>いったい、どういうことです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00100_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Save your breath. You will need it to plead your case. You and your entire order are to be tried for this atrocity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00100_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>貴様らには、暗殺計画への関与の疑いがかけられている！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Bring in the prisoner!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>……連れてこい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00010_ILBERD<tab>This <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> stands accused of poisoning Her Royal Majesty Nanamo Ul Namo. And as suspected accessories to the crime, all members of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn will be detained for questioning!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00010_ILBERD<tab>先ほど、この者にナナモ女王陛下が毒殺された！
犯人の協力者と思われる「暁」の成員を取り調べる。
一同、その場を動かないように！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00020_MINFILIA<tab>This is madness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00020_MINFILIA<tab>……そんな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00030_ILBERD<tab>What a pity... Who'd have thought your tale would end like this?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00030_ILBERD<tab>残念ですよ、英雄殿。
このようなことになるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Should you demand further proof, a vial with traces of the substance used to poison Her Grace was found upon the assassin's person.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>この冒険者が所持していた小瓶から、
ナナモ陛下を殺害したものと同じ毒が検出された。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00050_YSHTOLA<tab>How very convenient.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00050_YSHTOLA<tab>さては、はめられたわね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>You would speak of convenience?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>おやおや、はめられたのは我々の方ですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00070_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Who persuaded Her Grace to host this celebration? A diversion which presented you and your confederates ample opportunity to commit the crime, and a crowd within which to fade from view! A more “convenient” occasion I could scarcely imagine!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00070_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>まさか、我がウルダハの愛すべき女王陛下に取り入り、
イシュガルドと和平を結ぼうというこの場で、
陛下を暗殺したのですからな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00080_MINFILIA<tab>How dare you! After all we have done for Ul'dah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00080_MINFILIA<tab>言いがかりも、いい加減にしなさい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00090_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Hold your tongue, witch! I'll not be ensorcelled! I know all about the dark gift that you and your disciples wield!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00090_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>黙れ小娘！
貴様ら「暁の血盟」が、異能を持つ者を集め、
囲っていることはわかっているのだぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00100_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Oh, yes...I've observed how you worked upon the minds of the Alliance leaders, bending them to your will!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00100_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>その能力を使い、ナナモ陛下をはじめ、
各国の盟主に取り入ったのであろう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>And what of your <var 1A 02 /var>cordial<var 1A 01 /var> relationship with Ser Aymeric? For years, Ishgard abjured all contact with the outside world, and now the lord commander of the Temple Knights treats you with the familiarity of a childhood friend!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>それに、アイメリク卿とは、特使として接する以上に、
ずいぶん親しくしていたようではないか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00120_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I'll tell you what I think─I think this desperate defense of Ishgard was but a ruse to deceive us into dividing our forces.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00120_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>……さては、先の防衛戦。
ドラゴン族の侵攻からの防衛を大義名分に、
裏でイシュガルドと結託して、我々の兵力を分散……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00130_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Your next move will be to charm your Coerthan allies into invading our lands!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00130_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>そうして防衛力を削いだ上で、
イシュガルドにこの地を侵略するよう仕向けたのではないか！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00140_PAPALYMO<tab>Now that is truly ridiculous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00140_PAPALYMO<tab>そんな、無茶苦茶な！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00150_YDA<tab>How do you even think of this stuff!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00150_YDA<tab>どこにそんな証拠があるっての！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00160_RAUBAHN<tab>She... She cannot be dead...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00160_RAUBAHN<tab>そんな……ナナモ様が……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00170_RAUBAHN<tab>Stand aside, Ilberd! I want to see the sultana!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00170_RAUBAHN<tab>イルベルド……そこをどけ！
ナナモ様の安否を確認する！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00180_ILBERD<tab>Spare yourself the pain, brother. I saw her with my own eyes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00180_ILBERD<tab>落ち着くんだ、ラウバーン。
……先ほど俺が確認した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00190_ILBERD<tab>For a mercy, the poison took her swiftly─her handmaiden can attest to that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00190_ILBERD<tab>ナナモ陛下は、私室にて毒殺された。
そこの侍女も確認している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00200_RAUBAHN<tab>This cannot be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00200_RAUBAHN<tab>そんな……まさか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00210_RAUBAHN<tab>Nanamo... Nanamo... NOOOOOO!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00210_RAUBAHN<tab>ナナモ様……うおぉぉぉぉぉ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00010_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Plainly, the Royalists can no longer be relied upon to keep our nation safe. And so it falls to the Monetarists of the Syndicate to govern Ul'dah. But should you wish to help us, General, we would be more than happy to entrust the task of planning Her Grace's funeral to you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00010_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>もはや、王党派に国を守る資格無し！
ウルダハの政は、我々砂蠍衆……共和派が行うしかあるまいな。
せいぜい、陛下の国葬の段取りでも考えておくがいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00020_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>It seems only right that you should bury your precious sultana, and we will be glad to be rid of that burden.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00020_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>……まったく、貴様も陛下も手間を掛けさせる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00030_RAUBAHN<tab>I'll bet you will. You more than any man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00030_RAUBAHN<tab>貴様か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>...Whatever do you mean?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>……何の話だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00050_RAUBAHN<tab>I mean you had her killed, you black-hearted bastard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00050_RAUBAHN<tab>ナナモ様を暗殺したのは貴様か、テレジ・アデレジ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>What rot! ...Though I did have sufficient motive, 'tis true. That young lady caused me no end of grief.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>ふん、世迷いごとを。
……まぁ、あの小娘のために、
ずいぶんと苦労したのは確かだがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00070_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>She always was a most unwilling puppet. I daresay Her Grace was grateful that someone thought to cut her strings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00070_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>元々、傀儡の女王だったのだ。
ようやく操り糸が外れて、肩の荷が下りたと、
ザル神の御許で清々としているだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00080_RAUBAHN<tab>You would mock her? THEN MOCK HER FROM HELL!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00080_RAUBAHN<tab>陛下を……陛下を愚弄するな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00090_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Wha─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00090_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>……なっ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00100_LOLORITO<tab>Have you lost your mind, General!? It is forbidden to draw steel in the royal chambers, much less slaughter our fellow Syndicate members!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00100_LOLORITO<tab>ラウバーン、貴様乱心したか！
宮廷内で剣を抜き、
ましてや、同じ砂蠍衆の一員を斬り捨てるとは！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00110_LOLORITO<tab><gasp> ...You're one of them! You've been in league with the Scions all along!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00110_LOLORITO<tab>……まさか、貴様も「暁」と共犯なのではなかろうな！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00120_RAUBAHN<tab>YOU! You're next, you scheming bastard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00120_RAUBAHN<tab>ロロリト、貴様もかぁ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00130_RAUBAHN<tab>AAARRRGH!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00130_RAUBAHN<tab>ぐあぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁ！！！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00140_MERLWYB<tab>Seven hells!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00140_MERLWYB<tab>お前たち、何をしている！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00150_KANESENNA<tab>Raubahn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00150_KANESENNA<tab>ラウバーン局長！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00160_GUARD02500<tab>(-Maelstrom Soldier-)Admiral, we must leave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00160_GUARD02500<tab>(-黒渦団の護衛兵-)いけません、提督！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00170_MERLWYB<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00170_MERLWYB<tab>……くそ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00180_ILBERD<tab>How unlike you, old friend. I did not expect to take your arm so easily.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00180_ILBERD<tab>……らしくないな。
こうも簡単に隙を見せちまうとは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00230_LOLORITO<tab>Take the Scions into custody! They have conspired to commit regicide!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00230_LOLORITO<tab>「暁」の者たちを捕らえろ！
ナナモ陛下の暗殺と、国家転覆を企む首謀者だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00240_LOLORITO<tab>And arrest this traitor as well!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00240_LOLORITO<tab>この国賊も捕らえよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00190_RAUBAHN<tab>Ilberd! I hope you choke on their coin!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00190_RAUBAHN<tab>貴様……抱きこまれたか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00200_ILBERD<tab>'Tis better than the dirt I've supped on these long years. We can't all abandon Ala Mhigo and become great war heroes as you have.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00200_ILBERD<tab>俺たちは泥を啜って生きてきた……。
アラミゴを見捨て、英雄となったお前と違ってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00210_ILBERD<tab>You are not the man you once were, Raubahn. Since that girl strapped the yoke around your neck, you've become docile.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00210_ILBERD<tab>お前は変わったよ、ラウバーン。
守る者なんぞを持つから、生きることに寡欲になる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00220_ILBERD<tab>She took the mad bull and cut off his balls. And a bull that cannot rut is fit for naught but slaughter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00220_ILBERD<tab>……猛牛の角は折れた。
角の折れた牛は、あとは肉になるだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00250_ILBERD<tab>Shall I tell you who really killed your precious sultana?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00250_ILBERD<tab>ラウバーン、いいことを教えてやろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00251_ILBERD<tab>...It was me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00251_ILBERD<tab>……ナナモ陛下を暗殺した犯人は、俺だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00260_RAUBAHN<tab>You! You die!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00260_RAUBAHN<tab>イルベルドォォォォォォォ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00270_ILBERD<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00270_ILBERD<tab>ふんっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00280_RAUBAHN<tab>I never doubted you. Not for a moment. But there is more to this than I yet understand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00280_RAUBAHN<tab>貴様らが、ナナモ様を暗殺するなどあり得ないこと。
……この茶番には、裏がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00290_RAUBAHN<tab>Flee this place. Clear your names.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00290_RAUBAHN<tab>逃げろ……。
ここから逃げ延び、世間に己の身の潔白を証明しろ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00300_RAUBAHN<tab>Find out who is behind this plot! It is the only way! Now go!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00300_RAUBAHN<tab>そして、この事件の真相を突き止めろ！
これができるのは、貴様らしかいない。
……行けぇぇ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00310_RAUBAHN<tab>Yaaaaaargh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00310_RAUBAHN<tab>うおおおおおお！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00320_THANCRED<tab>Ah, there you are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00320_THANCRED<tab>無事だったか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00330_YSHTOLA<tab>Thancred! Where have you been?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00330_YSHTOLA<tab>サンクレッド！
あなた、いったい、どこにいたの！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00340_THANCRED<tab>Avoiding the fumbling advances of some very persistent admirers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00340_THANCRED<tab>デートの誘いが多くてね、断るのに大忙しだったのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00341_THANCRED<tab>When I realized the celebrations had turned sour, it seemed prudent to slip away and take stock of the situation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00341_THANCRED<tab>この「戦勝祝賀会」が仕組まれたものだとわかり、
いろいろ探ってきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00350_THANCRED<tab>'Twould appear that much of the city is already under tight guard. It occurs to me that expanding the Brass Blades' authority may not have been such a wonderful idea after all...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00350_THANCRED<tab>すでに、ウルダハの主要施設は抑えられている。
……イシュガルド防衛戦の折、
銅刃団の権限を拡大したのが仇になったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00360_PAPALYMO<tab>The success of this plan was contingent upon those thugs having the run of the place. Just how long has this scheme been in motion?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00360_PAPALYMO<tab>銅刃団が動きやすくなるように段取りがされていた……。
いったい、いつから準備されてたのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00370_YSHTOLA<tab>The careful preparations, the maneuvering of forces... I am inclined to agree with the General's insistence that a deeper plot exists here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00370_YSHTOLA<tab>周到な準備と、部隊の展開の早さ……。
……ラウバーン局長の言っていたとおり、何か裏があるわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00380_YDA<tab>So...would I be right in thinking we now have an excuse to pummel as many Brass Blades as we like?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00380_YDA<tab>銅刃団は元々傭兵が多いし、
敵に回ったクリスタルブレイブの連中も猛者揃いだよ。
パパリモ、腕が鳴るね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00390_PAPALYMO<tab>Unless you plan on pummeling them <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var>, I'm not sure that will greatly aid our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00390_PAPALYMO<tab>イダ、そんな呑気なこといってる場合じゃないぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00400_MINFILIA<tab>The sultana's assassination was but one part of the scheme. We too were its targets. And though we did not share poor Nanamo's fate, we are yet hobbled by the charges laid at our door. Where now might we seek refuge?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00400_MINFILIA<tab>ナナモ陛下だけを狙った計画ではない……。
もしや、わたしたちも狙われていた……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00410_PAPALYMO<tab>Where indeed. We may safely assume that our foe has thought to have the Rising Stones watched.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00410_PAPALYMO<tab>やれやれ、僕たちも嫌われたものだよ。
……そうなると、石の家を押さえたっていうのも本当だろうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00420_THANCRED<tab>Forgive me for stating the obvious, but our choice of destination will matter little if we cannot secure an escape route out of Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00420_THANCRED<tab>どのみち、ここから脱出しないと捕まっちまう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00430_THANCRED<tab>Happily, I believe I can provide one. Papashan once told me about the passages hidden in the walls of the palace. If I recall correctly, the fireplace in Nanamo's chambers conceals the entrance to a tunnel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00430_THANCRED<tab>ナナモ様の私室の暖炉裏……。
そこから地下に続く隠し通路があると、
以前、パパシャン所長に聞いたことがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00440_THANCRED<tab>It should lead outside the city, and allow us to avoid any messy confrontations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00440_THANCRED<tab>王宮の周辺は囲まれているからな、そこを使おう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00450_YDA<tab>The rest of you go on ahead. I'll handle this lot!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00450_YDA<tab>みんなは行って！
ここはあたしがやっちゃるよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00460_PAPALYMO<tab>By yourself!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00460_PAPALYMO<tab>本気か！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00461_PAPALYMO<tab><sigh> ...I suppose I shall just have to join you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00461_PAPALYMO<tab>……仕方ないな、付き合ってやるよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00480_YDA<tab>Crystal Braves, too, huh? Now <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> should be interesting!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00480_YDA<tab>クリスタルブレイブのみんなとは、
一度、戦ってみたかったんだよね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00470_MINFILIA<tab>Yda! Papalymo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00470_MINFILIA<tab>イダ、パパリモ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00490_PAPALYMO<tab>We will hold our pursuers here. Hurry, now! Find this tunnel of Thancred's!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00490_PAPALYMO<tab>ここで足止めをしておく。
だから、隠し通路の確保を急いでくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00500_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia! We cannot linger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00500_THANCRED<tab>ミンフィリア、早く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00010_YDA<tab>Ow! Now look what you've done!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00010_YDA<tab>いったー！
やりやがったな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00020_PAPALYMO<tab>Yda, are you all right!? There are just too many of them...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00020_PAPALYMO<tab>大丈夫か、イダ！
……くそ、キリがないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00030_YDA<tab>I'm fine! I could do this all day! How about you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00030_YDA<tab>へいき、へいき！
こんなんじゃ、やられないよ！
パパリモこそ、ダイジョーブ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00040_PAPALYMO<tab>...Nearing the end of my tether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00040_PAPALYMO<tab>……そろそろ限界かな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00050_YDA<tab>This is so <var 1A 02 /var>stupid<var 1A 01 /var>! We're the Scions of the Seventh Dawn! The ones who stand between this realm and the evil that's trying to destroy it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00050_YDA<tab>「暁」はね、みんなの希望……
アラミゴの民にとっても希望なんだ！
こんなところで終わらせやしないよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00060_PAPALYMO<tab>And if you think we'll leave the stewardship of Eorzea to the likes of your masters, then you're sorely mistaken!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00060_PAPALYMO<tab>ああ……。
それに、こんなやつらにエオルゼアを任せてはおけない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00070_YDA<tab>Sorry I dragged you into this, Papalymo...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00070_YDA<tab>パパリモ……。
付き合わせちゃってごめんね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00080_PAPALYMO<tab>Hah, 'tis hardly the first time. And I'll be damned if it will be the last.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00080_PAPALYMO<tab>お前の我侭はいつものことだろ。
こうなりゃ、最後まで付き合うさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00090_PAPALYMO<tab>Let them have it, Yda!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00090_PAPALYMO<tab>やっちまえ、イダ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00100_YDA<tab>I was hoping you'd say that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00100_YDA<tab>よーし、ぶっぱなすよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00010_MINFILIA<tab>I never knew such a watercourse existed beneath Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00010_MINFILIA<tab>ウルダハの地下に、こんな水路があっただなんて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00020_YSHTOLA<tab>The architecture is of the Sil'dihn style, if I am not mistaken. The ancients plainly foresaw the need for a ready means of escape.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00020_YSHTOLA<tab>おそらくは、有事の際の脱出通路ね。
……シラディハの建築様式かしら、ずいぶん昔のものだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00030_CRYSTALBRAVE02400<tab>(-???-)This way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00030_CRYSTALBRAVE02400<tab>(-追手の兵士-)こっちだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00040_THANCRED<tab>Well, that didn't take long. It seems these tunnels were not as secret as I had hoped.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00040_THANCRED<tab>あまりに兵の展開が早いな……。
この水路のことは、すでに調べがついていたか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00050_YSHTOLA<tab>You two go on ahead. Thancred and I will deal with this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00050_YSHTOLA<tab>あなたたちは先に行って。
ここは、私たちが食い止める。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00060_MINFILIA<tab>Wh-What do you mean to do!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00060_MINFILIA<tab>ヤ・シュトラ、サンクレッド！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Only that which is required to ensure that the dawn's light survive to brighten the morrow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00070_YSHTOLA<tab>「暁」の灯火を消してはいけないわ。
……この明かりは、明日への光なのだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00080_THANCRED<tab>Fear not, Antecedent. You haven't seen the last of these fair features.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00080_THANCRED<tab>この場は任せておきな。
また後で会おうぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00090_MINFILIA<tab>My friends...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00090_MINFILIA<tab>ふたりとも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00100_YSHTOLA<tab>Leave us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00100_YSHTOLA<tab>行って！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00110_THANCRED<tab>What is the plan, milady? Shall I take the dozen on the left, and you the dozen on the right? The odds are not exactly stacked in our favor...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00110_THANCRED<tab>さて、どうするお嬢さん。
こんな狭いところであの数……
良くて相打ち、下手すりゃ無駄死にだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00120_YSHTOLA<tab>Numbers will count for little when I bring the tunnel down upon their heads. Though I cannot say I relish the thought of being entombed with you for all eternity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00120_YSHTOLA<tab>誇り高き、ヤ族のミコッテをナメないことね。
……だったら、壁ごと破壊して一帯を封鎖するまでよ。
最後のお相手があなたってのは、ちょっと物足りないけどね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00130_THANCRED<tab>You wound me! I will have you know that many a maid would <var 1A 02 /var>kill<var 1A 01 /var> for the chance to spend forever at my side! Now, may I have the last dance?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00130_THANCRED<tab>やれやれ……。
こんな色男をつかまえて、欲張りなお嬢さんだ。
……それじゃ、最後のデート、エスコートいたしましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00140_THANCRED<tab>Ugh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00140_THANCRED<tab>くっ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00150_THANCRED<tab>Well, this is going splendidly... Now would be a good time, milady!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00150_THANCRED<tab>さすがにこの数が相手では……。
まだか、ヤ・シュトラ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00160_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis done!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00160_YSHTOLA<tab>……待たせたわね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00170_YSHTOLA<tab>Forgive me, Mhitra...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00170_YSHTOLA<tab>……ごめん、ヤ・ミトラ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00180_THANCRED<tab>Farewell, Minfilia...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00180_THANCRED<tab>さよならだ、ミンフィリア……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00010_MINFILIA<tab>Hydaelyn... She speaks to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00010_MINFILIA<tab>今、ハイデリンの声が……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00020_MINFILIA<tab>No!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00020_MINFILIA<tab>まさか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00030_MINFILIA<tab>I must remain behind...but you cannot stay with me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00030_MINFILIA<tab>私は、成すべき使命のため、ここに残ります。
あなたは先に行きなさい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00040_MINFILIA<tab>Please, you must go on! You are the Warrior of Light! You are <var 1A 02 /var>hope<var 1A 01 /var>─for the Scions, and for all the realm!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00040_MINFILIA<tab>聞いて！　あなたは希望なの……！
わたしたち「暁」にとって、エオルゼアにとって、
希望そのものなの！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00050_MINFILIA<tab>As long as your flame continues to burn, the light of the dawn may ever be relit!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00050_MINFILIA<tab>「希望の灯火」は、まだ消えてはいないわ。
「暁」の明かりは、希望の灯火である、あなたがいるかぎり、
何度でも、何度でも、灯すことができる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00060_MINFILIA<tab>You must escape, and save Eorzea from those who would plunge it into darkness!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00060_MINFILIA<tab>だから、生き延びて……。
そして……いつの日か、エオルゼアに救済を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00070_MINFILIA<tab>'Tis the only way...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00070_MINFILIA<tab>わかっています……。
こんなところで希望を……この星を救う「光の芽」を、
摘ませるわけにはいかないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am glad to see you safe, my friend! What of the others?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>……無事だったか！
ほかの皆は！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Damn that man!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>くそ……！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Teledji played me for a fool! I thought the Crystal Braves mine till the very moment I felt the blade at my back...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>まんまとテレジ・アデレジに出し抜かれた！
まさか、クリスタルブレイブごとやられるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00040_PIPPIN<tab>(-???-)There will be ample time for soul-searching later. For now, we must put some malms between us and Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00040_PIPPIN<tab>(-？？？？-)話はあとで。
まずは、ウルダハを離れなければ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00050_BREMONDT<tab>Well, if it ain't the hero of the Scions! You look to me like a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> in need of a nice, relaxin' carriage ride!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00050_BREMONDT<tab>久しぶりだな、英雄殿！
急いでいるんだろう？　乗りな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00060_BREMONDT<tab>Well, would you look who it is! Need a ride? I doubt it'll be half as excitin' as the last trip we took─not if I have anythin' to say about it, anyway!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00060_BREMONDT<tab>久しぶりだな、エーテル酔いの冒険者！
急いでいるんだろう？　乗りな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00070_BREMONDT<tab>Let's not dawdle, eh? All aboard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00070_BREMONDT<tab>……さぁ、早く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00010_BREMONDT<tab>I was stockin' up on supplies over in Vesper Bay, you see, when your sister come up an' begged a favor. Said her brother was havin' some trouble down in Ul'dah, an' likely needed a helpin' hand gettin' away.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00010_BREMONDT<tab>……たまたま、ベスパーベイに仕入れに行っていたところを、
ルヴェユール家のお嬢さんに声をかけられましてね。
ウルダハに居る兄が困っていると思うから、助けてほしいと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00020_BREMONDT<tab>Thinkin' them ruins would make a fine hidin' place, I decided to try there first...an' lo an' behold, there you were.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00020_BREMONDT<tab>それで、チョコボ・キャリッジでこの辺りを駆け回っていたら、
あんた方を発見したって流れさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00030_BREMONDT<tab>Aye, an' judgin' by them soldiers as were pourin' out of the city, I arrived not a moment too soon...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00030_BREMONDT<tab>さっきの様子、追われてたんでしょう？
無事でよかったですぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00040_BREMONDT<tab>Must've been fate that we happened to find <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> there though, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00040_BREMONDT<tab>まさか、お前さんにまで会えるとは思っていなかったがな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>I had thought to look out for Alisaie, but 'twould appear she was the one watching over me. I've made such a mess of things...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>目をかけていた妹にまで心配されるとは……。
……まったく情けない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00060_BREMONDT<tab>An' who might you be, young sir?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00060_BREMONDT<tab>……ところで、そちらのお兄さんは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00070_PIPPIN<tab>Pipin Tarupin, Vice Marshal of the Immortal Flames.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00070_PIPPIN<tab>私はピピンと言う。
……不滅隊の少闘将だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00080_PIPPIN<tab>I had been on the Ala Mhigan front these past few moons, but an urgent communication called me back to Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00080_PIPPIN<tab>長らくアラミゴ方面で極秘作戦を指揮していたのだが、
不滅隊の急事に呼び戻されてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00090_PIPPIN<tab>Scarce had my boots touched the cobbles, though, when the streets erupted with cries of assassination. I immediately went in search of answers, and came across Master Alphinaud here. Needless to say, I did not think his imprisonment justified.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00090_PIPPIN<tab>それが、帰隊直後に、この事件に遭遇……。
こちらのアルフィノ殿が、政変で窮地にあると知り、
救出したのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00100_PIPPIN<tab>The blame plainly lies with the Monetarists. Their greed and corruption are well known to me, but for them to take advantage of the situation with such alacrity...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00100_PIPPIN<tab>私の目からみても、非があるのは共和派の連中だ。
奴らの横暴が目に余るとは聞いていたが、
まさか、このような事態になるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00110_BREMONDT<tab>...Was that “Pipin,” you said? Ain't that the name of General Aldynn's lad?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00110_BREMONDT<tab>ピピンさんっていやぁ、不滅隊のラウバーン局長の？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00120_PIPPIN<tab>Yes, I am his son. Adopted, of course. 'Twas only as we were leaving Ul'dah that I learned of Father's fate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00120_PIPPIN<tab>ああ、ラウバーン・アルディンの養子だ。
……義父のことは、ウルダハを出る時に聞いた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00130_PIPPIN<tab>Once I have seen you a safe distance away, I mean to return to the city and extricate him from this madness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00130_PIPPIN<tab>私は、あなた方を安全な場所まで送った後、
すぐにウルダハに戻る。
義父を助けなければ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00140_BREMONDT<tab>Then you needn't travel no further than Black Brush─our fugitives have a friend waitin' for 'em there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00140_BREMONDT<tab>なら、このまんまブラックブラッシュに向かいますぜ。
ちょうどそこで、落ち合う人がいるもんでね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00150_ALPHINAUD<tab>I dreamed of bringing about Eorzea's salvation, but in the end...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00150_ALPHINAUD<tab>結局、私は皆に助けられた……。
……ひとりでは、何もできていなかったのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00160_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twas I who needed saving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00160_ALPHINAUD<tab>私は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00010_HAURCHEFANT<tab>There has been word from the capital. Ishgard has weathered another assault, and 'tis said several wyverns broke through into the city proper.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00010_HAURCHEFANT<tab>先ほど、本家から連絡があった……。
皇都がドラゴン族の襲撃に遭い、
数体のワイバーンが侵入したらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00020_HAURCHEFANT<tab>The Temple Knights succeeded in slaying the beasts, but the intrusion prompted orders to further strengthen the guard and to place the city under a perpetual state of alert.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00020_HAURCHEFANT<tab>神殿騎士団が撃退したとの報告は受けてはいるが、
イシュガルドは厳戒態勢を敷き、警戒を強めているという。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00030_HAURCHEFANT<tab>How keenly we feel the loss of our wards at the Gates of Judgement...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00030_HAURCHEFANT<tab>皇都への侵入を許してしまうとは……。
やはり、大審門の魔法障壁を失ったことが大きいか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00040_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Yet we must not bemoan our misfortune. Ser Aymeric is safely returned from Ul'dah and once more leads the defense of Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00040_HAURCHEFANT<tab>先に緊急帰国したアイメリク総長は、
騎士団本部で防衛の指揮を執っておられる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00050_HAURCHEFANT<tab>As for the matter of your asylum, I am afraid no progress will be made until the threat to our nation has diminished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00050_HAURCHEFANT<tab>お前を匿うために協力を仰ぎたいところだが、
本国が落ち着くまでは、辛抱するしかないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00060_HAURCHEFANT<tab>But do not despair! You are not without allies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00060_HAURCHEFANT<tab>だが、案ずるな。
お前の味方は、ここにもいるのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00070_HAURCHEFANT<tab>You are more than welcome to shelter here for as long as you wish. Pray think of it as a new headquarters of sorts─the “Falling Snows” or some such!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00070_HAURCHEFANT<tab>しばらくの間、ここを隠れ家として使うといい。
「暁」の基準に則るならば……
うむ、「雪の家」といったところだな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00080_HAURCHEFANT<tab>All frivolity aside, any who come here in search of you will receive no aid from House Fortemps. For once, the Ishgardian reputation for inhospitality shall work in our favor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00080_HAURCHEFANT<tab>お前を追う者が現れたとしても、
フォルタン家の断りなく家捜しはできまい。
他国に対して閉ざした門が、今はお前を守ってくれる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00090_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Agents of Ul'dah will find their every inquiry dismissed, and their every request for entry rebuffed, until such time as their masters have acknowledged your innocence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00090_HAURCHEFANT<tab>たとえ、ウルダハからの捜査要請を突きつけられようが、
お前の潔白が認められるまでは、すべて跳ね除けるぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00100_HAURCHEFANT<tab>You once fought to preserve the honor of my dear friend─'tis a blessing that I may now repay that debt in kind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00100_HAURCHEFANT<tab>お前はかつて、我が友の窮地に、潔白を信じ戦ってくれた。
その曇りなき心を、今度は私が守るとしよう。
お前もまた、大切な友なのだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00110_HAURCHEFANT<tab>But let us dwell no more on this. Pray join the rest of your companions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00110_HAURCHEFANT<tab>さあ、私の話はここまでだ。
「雪の家」で、「暁」の仲間が待っているぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00120_HAURCHEFANT<tab>'Tis bitterly cold this day. I suspect there are those who might welcome the warmth your presence brings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00120_HAURCHEFANT<tab>……今日は、とても冷え込むな。
お前の心で燃えている火を、少しわけてやるといい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis all my doing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>私のせいだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>I believed myself the only one who truly understood Eorzea's woes. And look what that arrogance has wrought.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>私だけが、エオルゼアを真に考えている……。
そんな驕りが、このような状況を招いたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>I gave commands, influenced governments with my certainty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>私の指示で人が動き、私の言葉が各国の政を左右する……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>I treated the Crystal Braves, and even the Scions themselves, as pawns in my great scheme to save the realm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>エオルゼアのために「クリスタルブレイブ」を作り、
祖父の残した「暁」にも、我がものかのように接してきた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>But in my headlong rush unto imagined glory, I paid no heed to the ground upon which I trod!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>私は驕り、焦り、大義に囚われて、
自分の足元を見ようとはしなかったのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>The salvation of Eorzea... What was it that I hoped to achieve?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>私にとって、エオルゼアの救済とは、いったい何だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Did I believe that I could rid the realm of every danger and difficulty? That I could defeat the Empire and the Ascians, and find homes for every refugee?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00070_ALPHINAUD<tab>蛮族、蛮神、ガレマール帝国、溢れかえる難民、
アウトロー戦区、ドラゴン族との千年戦争。
……そして、闇の使徒アシエン。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh yes, I was so very clever. “Become a guardian of Eorzea,” I implored, and sat back to watch my perfect army cleanse the land of chaos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>守護者になると理想を掲げ、自らの手を汚しもせずに、
私だけが、この地の混沌を解決できると粋がっていた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twas all but a means to feed my own vanity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>……そうか、己の欲望を満たすための道具だったのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Only when all is lost do I finally realize the truth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>……酷いざまだな。
すべてを失ってから気付くなんて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00110_TATARU<tab>Oh, Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00110_TATARU<tab>アルフィノ様……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00120_HAURCHEFANT<tab>So, Master Alphinaud, are you content to remain a broken blade? Is there no flame hot enough to reforge you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00120_HAURCHEFANT<tab>それで、アルフィノ殿……。
あなたはこのまま、折れた「剣」になるおつもりか？
……自身には、もう何も残っていないと？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00130_HAURCHEFANT<tab>What of the fine companions who yet stand at your side? I daresay the fires of their determination will soon have you slicing the air again with your customary wit!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00130_HAURCHEFANT<tab>いいや、あなたには、まだ仲間がいるではないか。
ともに歩むことができる、とびきりイイ仲間が！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00140_ALPHINAUD<tab>I hardly deserve such friendship. And besides, where are we to go...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00140_ALPHINAUD<tab>だが、私は……。
それに、この地ではもう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00150_TATARU<tab>Alphinaud? If I may...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00150_TATARU<tab>ア、アルフィノ様……。
あの……あの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00160_TATARU<tab>Should this place not serve our purpose, then...then we shall go to Ishgard!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00160_TATARU<tab>ここがダメでも、私たちは生きてるんでっす！
イ、イシュガルドに、行くでっす！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00170_TATARU<tab>Minfilia told me many times: as long as we stand fast against despair, the beacon of hope will never be lost to sight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00170_TATARU<tab>ミ、ミンフィリアさんは、言っていたでっす！
「暁」の灯火は、決して消えないんだって！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00180_TATARU<tab>Be it in the snow or in the clouds, we few will see that the dawn's light shines again!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00180_TATARU<tab>冒険者さんと、アルフィノ様と……！
あと、私がいるかぎり！
雪の中でも、雲の中でも、その明かりは灯せまっす！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00190_TATARU<tab><sniff> <sniff>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00190_TATARU<tab>あう……あう……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00200_ALPHINAUD<tab>You are right, Tataru, thank you. And thank you for your kind words, Lord Haurchefant.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00200_ALPHINAUD<tab>ありがとう、タタル。
ありがとう、オルシュファン殿。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00210_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis true that Eorzea yet has her guardians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00210_ALPHINAUD<tab>ありがとう、エオルゼアの真なる守護者よ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00220_ALPHINAUD<tab>The Scions have achieved much, and 'twould be remiss of me to discard it all in a fit of self-pity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00220_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうだな、一歩ずつ進もう。
今度は仲間と……みんなで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us then resume our journey, together...one step at a time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00230_ALPHINAUD<tab>「暁」の灯りは消さないさ……。
私たちの想いを、無にしてはならないのだから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Y00010_LADYINWAITING2<tab>All has been arranged as you desired, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Y00010_LADYINWAITING2<tab>すべて、ロロリト様の申しつけのままに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Y00020_LOLORITO<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Y00020_LOLORITO<tab>……チッ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Z00010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Heh heh heh. Thou thinkest sanctuary lieth beyond?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Z00010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>その先は、イシュガルド……。
我が一族の怨念が渦巻く不浄の大地……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Z00020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Delusion. Despair. Death. Thou shalt find naught else here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Z00020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>やはり、忌むべきはヒトの性……。
そうは思わぬか、ハイデリンの使徒よ。
